We collect personal information such as your name, email address, and payment details when you create an account or make purchases. We also gather usage data, including your IP address and device information, to enhance your experience.
Your information is used to provide and improve our services, process transactions, and communicate with you about updates and promotions.
We do not sell your personal information. We may share your data with trusted third-party service providers to assist with operations, but only as necessary and in compliance with applicable laws.
You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. You can also opt-out of marketing communications at any time.

We may update our privacy policy periodically. Any changes will be communicated through the app.
